definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiproliferative effects of folate on ovarian cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討葉酸對卵巢癌細胞增殖的影響及作用機制。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tobramycin eye drops is safety for clinic application.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察妥布黴素滴眼液的安全性。

sentences.english: It doesn't have a point. It's all process and form.
sentences.chinese: 它沒有目的，而僅僅是過程和形式。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the distribution of the neuropeptides in mouse sublingual gland.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察小鼠舌下腺內神經肽的分佈。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲檢查在卵泡膜細胞瘤診斷中的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To research the LISREL and its application in the biomedical studies.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討線性結構模型理論及其在醫學中的應用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the projection from the vestibular nuclei to the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠前庭神經核羣向脊髓的投射纖維特徵。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a successful animal model of steroid-induced osteonecrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的成功製作激素性骨壞死的動物模型。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment features of pulmonary heart disease caused by tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肺結核所致肺心病的診斷和治療特點。

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the training method of comprehensive competence for junior nurses in burn department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討燒傷科新護士綜合護理能力的培養方法。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the effect of laser combined with anal dilatation in the treatment of anal fissure.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲觀察激光加擴肛術治療肛裂的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical diagnosis of B-mode ultrasound to gynecologic acute abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討B型超聲對婦科急腹症的臨牀診斷價值。

sentences.english: Objective To review the recent developments in the research of oxazolidinone antibacterial drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目的闡述惡唑烷酮類抗菌藥物的最新研究進展。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the treatment and clinical diagnosis of right lower-abdominal mass.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討右下腹包塊的臨牀診斷與治療。

sentences.english: Objective Establish the quality standards for Jiere Xiaoyan Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高解熱消炎膠囊的質量標準。

sentences.english: All summer, my goal HAS BEEN to catch a firefly. ---How do you translate HAS BEEN?
sentences.chinese: 整個夏天，我的目的就是捉到一隻熒火蟲。

definition: in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
